id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for this component.

*See also: [rc522 Over I²C](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/rc522.html#id1)*

i2c_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [I²C Component](https://esphome.io/components/i2c.html#i2c) if you want to use multiple I²C buses.

*See also: [rc522 Over I²C](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/rc522.html#id1)*

address.docs:
**int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x28`.

*See also: [rc522 Over I²C](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/rc522.html#id1)*
